review: I love this thing. We were using Vizio Smart TV and it crashed all the time and was so slow, especially with stuff like fast-forwarding through Netflix. We switched out the Smart TV for our Sony non-smart TV and use this and we have been extremely happy. It's easily paired to YouTube which has made it even easier to navigate on our phones. We've only experienced a glitch or two, which was easily corrected by unplugging it and plugging it back in. I would recommend this to everyone.
author: MaijaPapaya
